00039 #ifndef LIBCURIE_INT_H
00040 #define LIBCURIE_INT_H
00041 
00042 /* NOTE: this file is rather platform/architecture specific, so this header file
00043          may need porting, depending on the target architecture. for this very
00044          purpose, the build system is capable of feeding the compiler with
00045          appropriate path information to allow overrides in the include/
00046          directory.
00047          this means, instead of mucking with wickedass macromagic, just add
00048          an appropriate directory under include/ and copy this file there. */
00049 
00050 /* longs should be the same length as pointers, really... we'll see compiler
00051    warnings if it ain't anyway, but the long<>pointer size thing holds true on
00052    the platforms that are of most concern to me, so it should be good enough. */
00053 typedef unsigned long int_pointer;
00054 
00055 /* this is either 64 bits or we can't get anything that long anyway */
00056 typedef unsigned long long int_64;
00057 
00058 /* an astounishing lot of machines use 32-bit ints ... */
00059 typedef unsigned int int_32;
00060 
00061 /* ... and 16-bit shorts ... */
00062 typedef unsigned short int_16;
00063 
00064 /* ... and 8-bit chars. */
00065 typedef unsigned char int_8;
00066 
00067 #endif
Generated on Sun Sep 7 20:39:15 2008 for Curie by  1.5.4
